languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс с печальной улыбкой качает головой.{/n} "Нет, {name}. Дела Инквизиции нередко привлекают внимание врагов Человечества к тем, кто столкнулся с агентами Золотого Трона. Это сложно признавать, но, если бы я не запросил помощь Ахиллеаса, был бы шанс избежать... всего этого".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс с печальной улыбкой качает головой.{/n} "Нет, {name}. Дела Инквизиции нередко привлекают внимание врагов Человечества к тем, кто столкнулся с агентами Золотого Трона. Это сложно признавать, но, если бы я не запросил помощь Ахиллеаса, был бы шанс избежать... всего этого".

languages.text: {n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс с печальной улыбкой качает головой.{/n} "Нет, {name}. Дела Инквизиции нередко привлекают внимание врагов Человечества к тем, кто столкнулся с агентами Золотого Трона. Это сложно признавать, но, если бы я не запросил помощь Ахиллеаса, был бы шанс избежать... всего этого".

The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

{n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

{n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

{n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

languages.text: {n}海因里希苦笑着摇了摇头。{/n}“不，{name}。审判庭的工作经常会让与那些黄金王座的代理人打过交道的人，成为人类之敌的目标。我本希望事情不是这样，可如果我当时并没有寻求阿吉里亚斯的帮助……这一切根本不会发生。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希苦笑着摇了摇头。{/n}“不，{name}。审判庭的工作经常会让与那些黄金王座的代理人打过交道的人，成为人类之敌的目标。我本希望事情不是这样，可如果我当时并没有寻求阿吉里亚斯的帮助……这一切根本不会发生。”

languages.text: {n}Con una sonrisa amarga, Heinrix menea la cabeza.{/n} «No, {name}. El trabajo de la Inquisición a menudo atrae la atención de los enemigos de la Humanidad sobre la gente que se ha cruzado con los agentes del Trono Dorado. Ojalá no fuera el caso pero, si no hubiera recurrido a Achilleas, podríamos habernos ahorrado... todo esto».
languages.original_text: {n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una sonrisa amarga, Heinrix menea la cabeza.{/n} «No, {name}. El trabajo de la Inquisición a menudo atrae la atención de los enemigos de la Humanidad sobre la gente que se ha cruzado con los agentes del Trono Dorado. Ojalá no fuera el caso pero, si no hubiera recurrido a Achilleas, podríamos habernos ahorrado... todo esto».

languages.text: {n}苦笑いを浮かべながら、ハインリックスは首を横に振る。{/n}「いいや、{name}。異端審問庁の仕事は、しばしば黄金の玉座のエージェントと交わった人物に人類の敵の注意を向けさせてしまうこともある。そうでなければよかったのだが…アキレアスに助けを求めなければ…こんなことにはならなかったのかもしれないな」
languages.original_text: {n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

traits.locale_text: {n}苦笑いを浮かべながら、ハインリックスは首を横に振る。{/n}「いいや、{name}。異端審問庁の仕事は、しばしば黄金の玉座のエージェントと交わった人物に人類の敵の注意を向けさせてしまうこともある。そうでなければよかったのだが…アキレアスに助けを求めなければ…こんなことにはならなかったのかもしれないな」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête avec un sourire amer.{/n} « Non, {name}. De par la nature de sa mission, l'Inquisition attire souvent l'attention des ennemis de l'humanité sur les individus qui croisent la route des agents du Trône d'Or. J'aimerais qu'il en soit autrement, mais si je n'avais pas cherché à obtenir l'aide d'Achilleas, tout cela aurait pu être évité. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête avec un sourire amer.{/n} « Non, {name}. De par la nature de sa mission, l'Inquisition attire souvent l'attention des ennemis de l'humanité sur les individus qui croisent la route des agents du Trône d'Or. J'aimerais qu'il en soit autrement, mais si je n'avais pas cherché à obtenir l'aide d'Achilleas, tout cela aurait pu être évité. »

languages.text: {n}Mit einem verbittertem Lächeln schüttelt Heinrix den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, {name}. Durch die Arbeit der Inquisition werden die Feinde der Menschheit oft auf Individuen aufmerksam, deren Wege sich mit den Agenten des Goldenen Throns gekreuzt haben. Ich wünschte, dem wäre nicht so, aber wenn ich nicht um Achilleas Hilfe gebeten hätte, wäre ... das alles nicht passiert."
languages.original_text: {n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem verbittertem Lächeln schüttelt Heinrix den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, {name}. Durch die Arbeit der Inquisition werden die Feinde der Menschheit oft auf Individuen aufmerksam, deren Wege sich mit den Agenten des Goldenen Throns gekreuzt haben. Ich wünschte, dem wäre nicht so, aber wenn ich nicht um Achilleas Hilfe gebeten hätte, wäre ... das alles nicht passiert."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, acı bir gülümsemeyle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır {name}. Engizisyon'un uğraşları, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının dikkatini Altın Taht'ın ajanlarıyla yolu kesişen kimselerin üzerine sıklıkla çeker. Böyle olmamasını dilerdim ancak Achilleas'ın yardımını aramasaydım belki tüm bunlardan... Kaçınabilirdik."
languages.original_text: {n}With a bitter smile, Heinrix shakes his head.{/n} "No, {name}. The work of the Inquisition often draws the attention of Humanity's foes to individuals who have crossed paths with the Golden Throne's agents. I wish it wasn't so, but, if I hadn't sought Achilleas's help, we could have avoided... all of this."
